In a previous exercise ( ) we already limited acces for users so they can´t see tasks. Additionally we want to be sure users are not able to modify document content while it has been sent to a consultant.
  • Open Administration > User Management > Permissions Management
  • Select Documents from the +Custom Set menu.
    • Name: Documents in Review Read-only
    • Query: status:inReview
  • Decline project_user to be able to: Create New, Modify content
  • Verify in frontend a project_user isn´t able to modify content of a document while it is in Review
Custom set to make documents read only
